title: Get off your fat ass
dialogue: Ow... My head... Wait, what time is it? I Should get up...

title: Rise and shine
dialogue: What is making so much noise... Is that my phone? Where did i leave it?

title: Gotta go, and fast!
dialogue: Wait, i don't remember that picture! And who is that girl? I've got to find out!

title: First!!!
dialogue: I should go to the pub, i could really use a beer right now. Maybe Ian wants to join?

title: One more can't hurt, right?
dialogue: Ian doesn't want to... Well i'd better go, the pils is waiting!
